attributes.action: Create a train line either above or under ground from Belfast to Enniskillen
attributes.additional_details: Will bring more visits and trade to the country. People would admire fermanagh and it's beauty more
attributes.background: People have been travelling 2 or more hours to get down to another part of the country. I think if we can have a train straight to dublin we should be able to get a train straight to the west. It'll benefit elderly when needing to visit the hospital and students when going back to university

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Northern Ireland Assembly is responsible for. 

If you'd like to send your petition to the Northern Ireland Assembly, you can find the contact details here:
http://www.niassembly.gov.uk/about-the-assembly/contact-us/
